elden-ring.name: Melina
elden-ring.description: A mysterious maiden who assists the Tarnished on their journey to becomes Elden Lord.

elden-ring.name: Malenia
elden-ring.description: The Goddess of Rot and one of the most powerful demigods in the Lands Between.

elden-ring.name: Ranni
elden-ring.description: The Princess of the Carian Royal Family who seeks to bring an Age of Stars.

elden-ring.name: Blaidd
elden-ring.description: A half-wolf warrior and loyal shadow to Ranni the Witch.

the-witcher-3.name: Geralt of Rivia
the-witcher-3.description: A legendary Witcher known as the White Wolf, searching for his adopted daughter Ciri.

the-witcher-3.name: Yennefer of Vengerberg
the-witcher-3.description: A powerful sorceress and the true love of Geralt, searching for Ciri through magical means.

the-witcher-3.name: Ciri
the-witcher-3.description: The Child of Destiny with the Elder Blood, capable of traveling between worlds.

the-witcher-3.name: Triss Merigold
the-witcher-3.description: A talented sorceress and close ally to Geralt, known for her mastery of fire magic.

god-of-war.name: Kratos
god-of-war.description: The former God of War who has retired to the Norse realms to raise his son Atreus.

god-of-war.name: Atreus
god-of-war.description: Kratos's son, a skilled archer who is discovering his own divine heritage as Loki.

god-of-war.name: Freya
god-of-war.description: A Vanir goddess and former Queen of the Valkyries who has a complex history with Kratos.

god-of-war.name: Baldur
god-of-war.description: An Aesir god and son of Odin, blessed (or cursed) with invulnerability to all physical and magical harm.

rdr2.name: Arthur Morgan
rdr2.description: A high-ranking member of the van der Linde gang, a man of few words but deep internal conflict.

rdr2.name: John Marston
rdr2.description: A former outlaw trying to go straight, father to Jack and husband to Abigail.

rdr2.name: Dutch van der Linde
rdr2.description: The idealistic and increasingly unstable leader of the van der Linde outlaw gang.

rdr2.name: Sadie Adler
rdr2.description: A widow turned fierce bounty hunter and close confidant of Arthur Morgan.

doom-eternal.name: Doom Slayer
doom-eternal.description: The legendary warrior fueled by rage, dedicated to the eternal slaughter of demonic forces.

doom-eternal.name: Samuel Hayden
doom-eternal.description: An enigmatic cyborg and former director of the UAC who oversees the Slayer's mission.

doom-eternal.name: Khan Maykr
doom-eternal.description: The supreme leader of the Maykrs, seeking to save her people at any cost.

cyberpunk.name: V (Character)
cyberpunk.description: A mercenary in Night City, dealing with a biochip containing the psyche of Johnny Silverhand.

cyberpunk.name: Johnny Silverhand
cyberpunk.description: A legendary rockerboy and anti-establishment rebel whose mind is trapped inside V's head.

cyberpunk.name: Jackie Welles
cyberpunk.description: A charismatic mercenary and V's best friend, dreaming of making it big in Night City.

cyberpunk.name: Judy Alvarez
cyberpunk.description: A technical genius and braindance specialist who becomes a close ally to V.

re-village.name: Ethan Winters
re-village.description: A father searching for his kidnapped daughter Rose in a mysterious and deadly village.

re-village.name: Alcina Dimitrescu
re-village.description: A giant noblewoman and one of the four lords of the village, known for her vampiric traits.

re-village.name: Mother Miranda
re-village.description: The enigmatic leader of the village who is worshiped by its inhabitants.

re-village.name: Chris Redfield
re-village.description: A veteran BSAA operative whose actions initially appear antagonistic to Ethan.

halo-infinite.name: John-117
halo-infinite.description: The Master Chief, a legendary Spartan-II supersoldier and humanity's greatest hero.

halo-infinite.name: Cortana
halo-infinite.description: A highly advanced Al and former partner of the Master Chief, whose fate remains a mystery.

halo-infinite.name: The Weapon
halo-infinite.description: A new AI designed to replace Cortana and assist the Master Chief on Zeta Halo.

halo-infinite.name: Escharum
halo-infinite.description: The leader of the Banished, an older and highly skilled Brute warrior seeking a final battle.

bloodborne.name: The Hunter
bloodborne.description: A traveler who comes to Yharnam seeking Paleblood and becomes trapped in the Hunter's Dream.

bloodborne.name: Plain Doll
bloodborne.description: An animated doll in the Hunter's Dream who assists the Hunter in leveling up.

bloodborne.name: Gehrman
bloodborne.description: The first Hunter and the host of the Hunter's Dream, serving as a guide to newcomers.

bloodborne.name: Father Gascoigne
bloodborne.description: A former hunter of the church who has succumbed to the beast blood.

tlou2.name: Ellie (The Last of Us Part II)
tlou2.description: A young woman seeking vengeance for a traumatic loss in a post-apocalyptic world.

tlou2.name: Abby Anderson
tlou2.description: A member of the WLF with her own tragic past, whose path crosses with Ellie's.

tlou2.name: Joel Miller
tlou2.description: A father figure to Ellie, whose past decisions have far-reaching consequences.

tlou2.name: Dina
tlou2.description: Ellie's companion and love interest, who accompanies her on her mission to Seattle.

skyrim.name: Last Dragonborn
skyrim.description: The legendary hero with the soul of a dragon, destined to stop the world-eater Alduin.

skyrim.name: Alduin
skyrim.description: The World-Eater, a powerful dragon who seeks to bring about the end of the world.

skyrim.name: Paarthurnax
skyrim.description: An ancient dragon who helps the Dragonborn and leads the Greybeards.

skyrim.name: Balgruuf the Greater
skyrim.description: The Jarl of Whiterun, a pragmatic leader during the Skyrim civil war.

fallout-4.name: Sole Survivor
fallout-4.description: A parent who emerges from Vault 111 into the Commonwealth wasteland to find their lost son.

fallout-4.name: Piper Wright
fallout-4.description: A determined journalist in Diamond City who becomes a companion to the Sole Survivor.

fallout-4.name: Nick Valentine
fallout-4.description: A synth detective with the memories of a pre-war cop, operating a detective agency in Diamond City.

fallout-4.name: Paladin Danse
fallout-4.description: A dedicated officer of the Brotherhood of Steel, committed to their mission of technological preservation.

mass-effect.name: Commander Shepard
mass-effect.description: The first human Spectre and commander of the SSV Normandy, tasked with saving the galaxy.

mass-effect.name: Garrus Vakarian
mass-effect.description: A Turian former C-Sec officer and loyal companion to Shepard throughout the trilogy.

mass-effect.name: Liara T'Soni
mass-effect.description: An Asari archaeologist and biotic specialist who becomes an expert on the Protheans.

mass-effect.name: Tali'Zorah
mass-effect.description: A Quarian technical genius on her Pilgrimage who joins Shepard's crew.

persona-5.name: Protagonist (Persona 5)
persona-5.description: The leader of the Phantom Thieves of Hearts, code-named Joker.

persona-5.name: Morgana
persona-5.description: A mysterious cat-like creature who serves as a guide to the Phantom Thieves.

persona-5.name: Ryuji Sakamoto
persona-5.description: A hot-headed former track star and founding member of the Phantom Thieves.

persona-5.name: Ann Takamaki
persona-5.description: A kind-hearted girl and member of the Phantom Thieves who uses fire magic.

baldur's-gate-3.name: Shadowheart
baldur's-gate-3.description: A cleric of Shar with a mysterious object and a hidden past.

baldur's-gate-3.name: Astarion
baldur's-gate-3.description: A high elf vampire spawn who has spent centuries as a slave to a cruel master.

baldur's-gate-3.name: Gale
baldur's-gate-3.description: A human wizard with a dangerous magical condition and an ambitious past.

baldur's-gate-3.name: Lae'zel
baldur's-gate-3.description: A fierce Githyanki warrior dedicated to her people and their mission to hunt mind flayers.

ff7-remake.name: Cloud Strife
ff7-remake.description: A cold and distant mercenary and former member of SOLDIER, wielding the iconic Buster Sword.

ff7-remake.name: Tifa Lockhart
ff7-remake.description: A master of martial arts and member of the anti-Shinra group AVALANCHE.

ff7-remake.name: Aerith Gainsborough
ff7-remake.description: A flower girl from the Sector 5 slums with a mysterious connection to the planet.

ff7-remake.name: Barret Wallace
ff7-remake.description: The passionate leader of an AVALANCHE cell, fighting to save the planet from Shinra.

ghost-of-tsushima.name: Jin Sakai
ghost-of-tsushima.description: The last surviving member of Clan Sakai, who must choose between his samurai code and his home.

ghost-of-tsushima.name: Lord Shimura
ghost-of-tsushima.description: The Jito of Tsushima and Jin's uncle, who values honor and the traditional way of the samurai.

ghost-of-tsushima.name: Yuna
ghost-of-tsushima.description: A nimble thief who helps Jin adopt the methods of the Ghost to fight the Mongol invasion.

ghost-of-tsushima.name: Khotun Khan
ghost-of-tsushima.description: The ruthless leader of the Mongol invasion of Tsushima, a master tactician.

horizon-zero-dawn.name: Aloy
horizon-zero-dawn.description: A young hunter and outcast who discovers her origins and the true history of the world.

horizon-zero-dawn.name: Sylens
horizon-zero-dawn.description: A mysterious and highly intelligent wanderer who assists Aloy while pursuing his own agenda.

horizon-zero-dawn.name: Rost
horizon-zero-dawn.description: Aloy's adoptive father and a mentor who raised her in the wilds as an outcast.

horizon-zero-dawn.name: Erend
horizon-zero-dawn.description: A captain of the Vanguard and a loyal ally to Aloy in her journey.

starfield.name: Sarah Morgan
starfield.description: The leader of Constellation and a former soldier with a passion for exploration.

starfield.name: Sam Coe
starfield.description: A skilled pilot and former Space Ranger with a deep connection to the Freestar Collective.

starfield.name: Barrett
starfield.description: A brilliant scientist and explorer with a quick wit and a love for discovery.

starfield.name: Andreja
starfield.description: A mysterious member of Constellation with a complex past and unique skills.

disco-elysium.name: Harrier Du Bois
disco-elysium.description: A troubled detective trying to solve a murder while dealing with amnesia and his own internal voices.

disco-elysium.name: Kim Kitsuragi
disco-elysium.description: Harry's patient and professional partner from another precinct, a steadying influence.

disco-elysium.name: Klaasje Amandou
disco-elysium.description: A mysterious woman and key witness in the murder investigation.

disco-elysium.name: Evrart Claire
disco-elysium.description: The corrupt but influential leader of the dockworkers' union in Martinaise.

destiny-2.name: Zavala
destiny-2.description: The Vanguard Commander and a Titan who has dedicated his life to protecting the Last City.

destiny-2.name: Ikora Rey
destiny-2.description: The Vanguard for Warlocks and a powerful master of the Void.

destiny-2.name: Cayde-6
destiny-2.description: The former Hunter Vanguard known for his wit and adventurous spirit.

destiny-2.name: The Witness
destiny-2.description: An ancient and powerful entity that is the ultimate antagonist of the Guardians.

apex-legends.name: Wraith
apex-legends.description: A skirmisher with the ability to travel through dimensions and hear voices from other worlds.

apex-legends.name: Bloodhound
apex-legends.description: A master tracker and legendary hunter, known for their connection to the Old Ways.

apex-legends.name: Gibraltar
apex-legends.description: A defensive legend dedicated to protecting his teammates on the battlefield.

apex-legends.name: Lifeline
apex-legends.description: A support legend and combat medic who uses her skills to save lives.

titanfall-2.name: Jack Cooper
titanfall-2.description: A frontiersman turned pilot who forms a bond with the Titan BT-7274.

titanfall-2.name: BT-7274
titanfall-2.description: An Vanguard-class Titan and Jack Cooper's partner in their mission to stop the IMC.

titanfall-2.name: Kuben Blisk
titanfall-2.description: A ruthless mercenary leader and commander of the Apex Predators.

titanfall-2.name: Ash
titanfall-2.description: A simulacrum pilot and cold-blooded assassin who works for the Apex Predators.

half-life-2.name: Gordon Freeman
half-life-2.description: The silent protagonist and theoretical physicist who becomes a icon of the resistance.

half-life-2.name: Alyx Vance
half-life-2.description: A core member of the resistance and Gordon's close ally in his journey.

half-life-2.name: G-Man
half-life-2.description: An enigmatic and seemingly supernatural figure who monitors and manipulates Gordon.

half-life-2.name: Barney Calhoun
half-life-2.description: A former Black Mesa security guard and undercover resistance member.

bioshock.name: Jack (BioShock)
bioshock.description: The protagonist who arrives in the underwater city of Rapture and discovers its dark secrets.

bioshock.name: Andrew Ryan
bioshock.description: The visionary and megalomaniacal founder of Rapture, who believes in a society without limits.

bioshock.name: Big Daddy
bioshock.description: Protecters of the Little Sisters, genetically enhanced humans in deep-sea diving suits.

bioshock.name: Little Sister
bioshock.description: Genetically modified girls who harvest ADAM from corpses in the ruins of Rapture.

borderlands-3.name: Lilith
borderlands-3.description: The leader of the Crimson Raiders and a powerful Siren known as the Firehawk.

borderlands-3.name: Claptrap
borderlands-3.description: A wise-cracking and often annoying CL4P-TP general purpose robot.

borderlands-3.name: Zane
borderlands-3.description: A semi-retired corporate hitman with multiple gadgets and a sharp tongue.

borderlands-3.name: Amara
borderlands-3.description: A Siren and a champion of the people, capable of summoning powerful ethereal arms.

overwatch-2.name: Tracer
overwatch-2.description: A time-traveling adventurer and former test pilot who uses her abilities to help others.

overwatch-2.name: Winston
overwatch-2.description: A brilliant genetically engineered gorilla and leader of the Overwatch team.

overwatch-2.name: Reaper
overwatch-2.description: A vengeful assassin with phantom-like abilities, formerly an Overwatch associate.

overwatch-2.name: Mei
overwatch-2.description: A climatologist and adventurer who uses weather-altering technology to protect the environment.

cod-mw.name: John Price (Reboot)
cod-mw.description: A legendary SAS officer and leader of Task Force 141.

cod-mw.name: Simon Riley (Reboot)
cod-mw.description: The iconic and mysterious Ghost, a master of stealth and tactical operations.

cod-mw.name: John MacTavish (Reboot)
cod-mw.description: Soap, a highly skilled demolitions expert and sniper.

cod-mw.name: Kyle Garrick
cod-mw.description: Gaz, a former police officer and key member of Task Force 141.

battlefield-1.name: Frederick Bishop
battlefield-1.description: A grizzled veteran who mentors a young message runner during the Gallipoli campaign.

battlefield-1.name: Danny Edwards
battlefield-1.description: A young tank driver who learns the harsh realities of war on the Western Front.

battlefield-1.name: Luca Vincenzo Coccila
battlefield-1.description: An Italian Arditi soldier reflecting on his experiences in the Alps.

r6-siege.name: Ash
r6-siege.description: An FBI SWAT operator known for her explosive entry capabilities.

r6-siege.name: Jäger
r6-siege.description: A GSG 9 operator who specializes in defense and trophy systems.

r6-siege.name: Thermite
r6-siege.description: An FBI SWAT operator with powerful exothermic charges for breaching.

r6-siege.name: Thatcher
r6-siege.description: An SAS operator whose EMP grenades are essential for disabling enemy technology.

far-cry-6.name: Dani Rojas
far-cry-6.description: The protagonist and revolutionary fighter seeking to liberate Yara from a dictator.

far-cry-6.name: Antón Castillo
far-cry-6.description: The ruthless dictator of Yara who seeks to preserve his family's legacy.

far-cry-6.name: Guapo
far-cry-6.description: Dani's loyal pet alligator and combat companion.

far-cry-6.name: Juan Cortez
far-cry-6.description: A legendary spymaster and revolutionary mentor to Dani.

metro-exodus.name: Artyom
metro-exodus.description: The protagonist who leads a group of survivors out of the Moscow Metro in search of a new home.

metro-exodus.name: Anna Mel'nikova
metro-exodus.description: Artyom's wife and a highly skilled sniper in the Spartan Order.

metro-exodus.name: Miller
metro-exodus.description: The leader of the Spartan Order and a fatherly figure to Artyom and Anna.

metro-exodus.name: Sam
metro-exodus.description: A former US Marine and Spartan Ranger who dreams of returning to his homeland.

wolfenstein-2.name: William Joseph Blazkowicz
wolfenstein-2.description: The legendary Nazi-slayer and leader of the American resistance.

wolfenstein-2.name: Anya Oliwa
wolfenstein-2.description: Blazkowicz's wife and a vital member of the resistance intelligence network.

wolfenstein-2.name: Frau Engel
wolfenstein-2.description: A high-ranking and sadistic Nazi officer who is the primary antagonist.

wolfenstein-2.name: Seth Roth
wolfenstein-2.description: A brilliant Jewish scientist and inventor who provides advanced technology to the resistance.

crysis.name: Laurence "Prophet" Barnes
crysis.description: The commander of Raptor Team and a veteran with a deep connection to the Nanosuit.

crysis.name: Michael "Psycho" Sykes
crysis.description: A member of Raptor Team known for his aggressive and effective combat style.

crysis.name: Nomad
crysis.description: The protagonist of the first Crysis, a member of Raptor Team in a Nanosuit.

crysis.name: Alcatraz
crysis.description: A Marine who becomes the host for Prophet's Nanosuit in Crysis 2.

silent-hill-2.name: James Sunderland
silent-hill-2.description: A man who travels to Silent Hill after receiving a letter from his deceased wife.

silent-hill-2.name: Mary Shepherd-Sunderland
silent-hill-2.description: James's wife who died of a long illness three years before the start of the game.

silent-hill-2.name: Maria
silent-hill-2.description: A mysterious woman James meets in Silent Hill who bear a striking resemblance to Mary.

silent-hill-2.name: Angela Orosco
silent-hill-2.description: A troubled young woman James encounter in Silent Hill, searching for her mother.

dead-space.name: Isaac Clarke
dead-space.description: An engineer trapped on a spaceship infested with horrific necro-morphs.

dead-space.name: Nicole Brennan
dead-space.description: Isaac's girlfriend and a medical officer on the USG Ishimura.

dead-space.name: Kendra Daniels
dead-space.description: A computer specialist and member of the Ishimura search and rescue team.

dead-space.name: Zach Hammond
dead-space.description: The chief security officer and leader of the Search and Rescue mission.

amnesia.name: Daniel
amnesia.description: A man who awakens in a dark castle with no memories of his past, pursued by a shadowy presence.

amnesia.name: Alexander of Brennenburg
amnesia.description: The lord of the castle who has been performing dark rituals to prolong his life.

amnesia.name: Agrippa
amnesia.description: An ancient scholar trapped in the castle, who guides Daniel through the darkness.

outlast-2.name: Blake Langermann
outlast-2.description: A cameraman and journalist who becomes stranded in a remote cultist-controlled village.

outlast-2.name: Lynn Langermann
outlast-2.description: Blake's wife and a journalist who is kidnapped by the cultists.

outlast-2.name: Sullivan Knoth
outlast-2.description: The charismatic and fanatical leader of the cult in Temple Gate.

outlast-2.name: Val
outlast-2.description: The leader of the Heretics, a group that has broken away from Knoth's cult.

alien-isolation.name: Amanda Ripley
alien-isolation.description: The daughter of Ellen Ripley, searching for the truth about her mother's disappearance.

alien-isolation.name: Christopher Samuels
alien-isolation.description: A Weyland-Yutani synthetic who assists Amanda in her journey.

alien-isolation.name: Ricardo
alien-isolation.description: A security officer on Sevastopol Station who helps Amanda survive the Alien.

alien-isolation.name: Working Joe
alien-isolation.description: Hostile synthetic assistants on Sevastopol Station who have turned on the crew.

evil-within-2.name: Sebastian Castellanos
evil-within-2.description: A detective who enters a nightmarish simulated world to save his daughter Lily.

evil-within-2.name: Juli Kidman
evil-within-2.description: Sebastian's former partner and an agent of Mobius who assists him from the outside.

evil-within-2.name: Theodore Wallace
evil-within-2.description: A manipulative cult leader who seek to control the STEM system.

evil-within-2.name: Stefano Valentini
evil-within-2.description: A sadistic artist who use the nightmarish creatures of STEM for his work.

alan-wake-2.name: Alan Wake
alan-wake-2.description: A best-selling horror writer who has been trapped in a dark dimension for thirteen years.

alan-wake-2.name: Saga Anderson
alan-wake-2.description: An FBI profiler investigating a series of ritualistic murders in the Pacific Northwest.

alan-wake-2.name: Alex Casey
alan-wake-2.description: Saga's partner and an FBI agent who is also a character in Alan Wake's novels.

alan-wake-2.name: Mr. Door
alan-wake-2.description: An enigmatic and powerful figure who exists in the dark dimension alongside Alan Wake.

phasmophobia.name: Ghost Hunter
phasmophobia.description: The player character, a member of a team investigating paranormal activity.

phasmophobia.name: Spirit
phasmophobia.description: The most common ghost type, but still very dangerous to inexperienced hunters.

phasmophobia.name: Wraith
phasmophobia.description: A ethereal ghost that can travel through walls and tracks by sound.

phasmophobia.name: Phantom
phasmophobia.description: A ghost that can possess the living and cause deep fear in those who see it.

until-dawn.name: Samantha Giddings
until-dawn.description: A kind and resourceful girl who becomes a key leader of the group.

until-dawn.name: Michael Munroe
until-dawn.description: A charming and ambitious boy who must use his wits to survive the night.

until-dawn.name: Joshua Washington
until-dawn.description: A young man who has organized the winter getaway in memory of his sisters.

until-dawn.name: Hannah Washington
until-dawn.description: One of Josh's sisters whose disappearance a year earlier triggered the game's events.

little-nightmares-2.name: Mono
little-nightmares-2.description: A young boy with a paper bag over his head who must navigate a distorted world.

little-nightmares-2.name: Six
little-nightmares-2.description: A girl in a yellow raincoat who becomes Mono's companion in his journey.

little-nightmares-2.name: The Hunter
little-nightmares-2.description: A giant and formidable hunter who pursues Mono and Six in the beginning.

little-nightmares-2.name: The Teacher
little-nightmares-2.description: A long-necked and terrifying teacher who guards the school.

layers-of-fear.name: The Painter
layers-of-fear.description: The protagonist, a struggling artist whose descent into madness is the core of the game.

layers-of-fear.name: The Musician
layers-of-fear.description: The Painter's wife, a talented pianist whose career was cut short by a tragic accident.

layers-of-fear.name: The Artist's Daughter
layers-of-fear.description: A young girl caught in the middle of her parents' deteriorating relationship.

soma.name: Simon Jarrett
soma.description: A man who undergoes a brain scan and awakens in a decaying underwater research facility.

soma.name: Catherine Chun
soma.description: A scientist at the facility who guide Simon through the AI-controlled research center.

soma.name: The WAU
soma.description: An artificial intelligence that has taken over the facility and corrupted the inhabitants.

soma.name: Brandon Wan
soma.description: A former security chief who is now a semi-sentient corrupted being.

fatal-frame.name: Mio Amakura
fatal-frame.description: A young girl who visits a lost village where she is hunted by spirits.

fatal-frame.name: Mayu Amakura
fatal-frame.description: Mio's twin sister who has a mysterious connection to the village's spirits.

fatal-frame.name: Sae Kurosawa
fatal-frame.description: The vengeful spirit of a girl who was sacrificed in a tragic ritual in the village.

dead-by-daylight.name: Evan MacMillan
dead-by-daylight.description: The Trapper, a powerful and iconic killer who uses bear traps to hunt survivors.

dead-by-daylight.name: Dwight Fairfield
dead-by-daylight.description: A survivor who is known for his leadership skills and ability to hide.

dead-by-daylight.name: Meg Thomas
dead-by-daylight.description: A fast and agile survivor who can outrun many killers.

dead-by-daylight.name: Claudette Morel
dead-by-daylight.description: A survivor with deep knowledge of healing and medical supplies.

portal-2.name: Chell
portal-2.description: The silent protagonist who must use the portal gun to escape the Aperture Science facility.

portal-2.name: GLaDOS
portal-2.description: The cynical and manipulative AI that controls the testing chambers.

portal-2.name: Wheatley
portal-2.description: A talkative and initially helpful personality core who has his own hidden agenda.

portal-2.name: Cave Johnson
portal-2.description: The eccentric and ambitious founder of Aperture Science, heard through recordings.
